content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our journey began in 1993 with 3 developers, 1 small office and 1 client. Since then, EPAM has grown tremendously! Today we are at the forefront of some of the most exciting technological changes in the industry, and our story continues in the modern age of agile delivery, big data, machine learning and AI.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/33f2b54a-2cbe-417b-b96a-56621f16beb1/image2019-6-20_16-44-30.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":729,\"height\":294}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Organizational structure of EPAM\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3a9df601-4c38-441e-b4e4-885222c514fc/image2019-6-19_14-37-29.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":941,\"height\":418}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
